Description: Production-ready infrastructure with HA, security, and compliance features for PCI DSS payment processing application

Environment.Description: Environment name for tagging and configuration

ProjectName.Description: Project name for resource naming and tagging

Owner.Description: Owner email for tagging and notifications
Owner.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid email address

CostCenter.Description: Cost center for billing and cost allocation

NumberOfAvailabilityZones.Description: Number of availability zones to deploy resources across. ALB and RDS require at least 2 AZs.

UseCustomAZs.Description: Set to true if you want to specify custom AZ names, otherwise uses region defaults

CustomAZ1.Description: Custom first AZ (only used if UseCustomAZs is true)

CustomAZ2.Description: Custom second AZ (only used if UseCustomAZs is true)

CustomAZ3.Description: Custom third AZ (only used if UseCustomAZs is true)

EnableNATGatewayHA.Description: Enable NAT Gateway in all AZs for HA (false uses single NAT for dev/staging)

InstanceType.Description: EC2 instance type for application servers

MinInstances.Description: Minimum number of EC2 instances in Auto Scaling Group

MaxInstances.Description: Maximum number of EC2 instances in Auto Scaling Group

DesiredInstances.Description: Desired number of EC2 instances in Auto Scaling Group

LatestAmiId.Description: Latest Amazon Linux 2 AMI ID from SSM Parameter Store

DBWriterInstanceClass.Description: Instance class for Aurora writer instance

DBReaderInstanceClass.Description: Instance class for Aurora reader instances

DBBackupRetentionPeriod.Description: Number of days to retain automated database backups (PCI DSS requires 30+)

SSLCertificateArn.Description: ARN of the SSL certificate in ACM for HTTPS listener (leave empty to disable HTTPS)

LogRetentionDays.Description: Days to retain logs before transitioning to Glacier

NotificationEmail.Description: Email address for CloudWatch alarm notifications

CPUAlarmThreshold.Description: CPU utilization threshold for scaling and alerts (percentage)

DatabaseConnectionsThreshold.Description: Database connections threshold for alerts (percentage of max)

KeyPairName.Description: EC2 Key Pair for SSH access (leave empty to disable SSH access)

Properties.GroupDescription: Security group for Application Load Balancer - allows HTTPS/HTTP from internet

SecurityGroupIngress.Description: Allow HTTP from Internet (for redirect to HTTPS)

Properties.GroupDescription: Security group for application instances - allows traffic only from ALB
Security group for Aurora database cluster - allows MySQL only from app tier

SecurityGroupIngress.Description: Allow MySQL from Application tier only

Properties.DBSubnetGroupDescription: Subnet group for Aurora cluster across multiple AZs

Properties.Description: KMS key for RDS Aurora cluster encryption at rest

Statement.Sid: Allow RDS to use the key

Properties.Description: Aurora MySQL 8.0 Cluster Parameter Group with optimized settings
KMS key for S3 database backup bucket encryption

Statement.Sid: Allow S3 to use the key

Properties.AlarmDescription: Triggers when CPU exceeds threshold for 2 consecutive periods
Alarm when database connections exceed threshold percentage
Alarm when any target becomes unhealthy
Alarm when target response time exceeds 2 seconds

Properties.Description: Checks that S3 buckets have encryption enabled
Checks that S3 buckets have versioning enabled
Checks that RDS instances have encrypted storage
Checks that resources have required tags for governance

ALBHostedZone.Description: ALB Hosted Zone ID for Route53 alias records

Value.Fn::Sub:
Stack deployed with ${NumberOfAvailabilityZones} AZ(s)
${ProjectName} ${Environment} Infrastructure Deployment
